summary: An Ordinance ratifying and confirming a loan of Fifty Thousand Dollars ($50,000) authorized by Ordinance No. 23223 of The City of Seattle, approved February 3, 1910, and by an election held in said city on the 8th day of March, 1910, under and pursuant to said Ordinance, authorizing and direction the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue bonds therefor, providing for the form and delivery of such bonds, and providing for the payment of the principal and interest thereof.
